entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a student who receives a compliment from Professor McGonagall. He has an 'Exceeds Expectations' in Charms, but his grandmother thinks Charms is a soft option.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher who pays Neville a compliment and encourages him to take Charms. She also reminds Augusta that just because she failed her Charms O.W.L., the subject is not worthless.

entities.name: augusta
entities.description: Augusta is Neville's grandmother who thinks Charms is a soft option. Professor McGonagall reminds her that just because she failed her Charms O.W.L., the subject is not worthless.

entities.name: parvati patil
entities.description: Parvati Patil is a student who asks Professor McGonagall about Firenze's teaching schedule for Divination.

entities.name: firenze
entities.description: Firenze is a handsome centaur who teaches Divination. He and Professor Trelawney are dividing classes between them.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is a teacher who is dividing classes with Firenze for Divination.
